text: if you're wondering what to make for a
convenient preference today I will share
with you my simple recipe to make
sausage bread as begin ingredients you
need 415 gram of all-purpose flour
program instant yeast 3 gram salt
Telegram sugar 32 gram milk powder 1 egg
100 ml of milk 145 ml of water and 25
gram of unsalted butter firstly combine
sugar flour milk powder and mix well
[Music]
then add the instant yeast in salt put
them away from each other as the yeast
cannot be activated if it touches the
such mix well next add milk water and
eggs knead the dough at low speed and
then gradually increase too high and
knead for about 10 minutes the dough is
quite wet so it's might be sticky if you
knead by hand next add hologram of
butter and it until you get a smooth and
soft dough it will still look quite
tacky but that's how it should be we
love our bread really soft so don't add
more flour as it will make it tougher
[Music]
cover with plastic wrap and proof for 1
hour until it doubles in size
next cult your hands and the counter
with some flour and pour the dough out
to the counter and knead for about one
minute apply some flour to prevent the
sticking and use the dough Scrabble to
move things around easily roll it into a
cylinder divide the dough into eight to
ten small portions and then shape the
dough the easiest ways to shape the
dough into a long stick and then pull
the ends together and place the sausage
on it the second way is to roll the
dough flat and then play the sausage in
the middle trim off the excess and then
roll it up if the dough is sticky
sprinkle a little bit more flour just
enough to prevent sticking and not too
much or the bread will be too dense and
use a knife to cut the roll into you
about two centimetres size but not all
the way through and pull to the side
just like that how beautiful the third
way it's similar to previous one but I'm
cutting it thinner just about one
centimeter or 1/8 of an inch and then
make both ends meet
[Music]
another way you can try is roll out the
dough to a Bell once and the method
thick and then cut out a square with the
same length of a sausage and then play
the sausage on it and use a knife to
make parallel cuts on both sides and
then fold the dough in turn wrapping the
sausage like a mummy
place the shape dough on parchment paper
and then let's rest for another 20
minutes to write further then brush with
egg wash and bake at 180 degrees F for
about 15 to 17 minutes until golden
brown
[Music]
finally brush with butter and sprinkle
green onions drizzle some mayonnaise or
ketchup on chilli sauce and enjoy if you
want the sauce to absorb into the bread
you can do this step before making wow
look at that the brass is so soft and
fluffy
[Music]
i shape some of the leftover dough into
a bun and you can see how extra soft
this recipe will make i hope you enjoyed
this recipe and please give it a like
share this video with your friends don't
forget to subscribe that I will see you
then next time bye
